name: ProofHub
tag_list: project-management, project-management-software, collaboration-software, time-tracking-software, proofing-system, proofing-software, online-proofing, project-management-with-chat, manage-projects, projects, freelancers
overview:
ProofHub is a web based project management and collaboration software that helps companies, groups and freelancers manage, schedule, discuss, work and communicate with clients and team. ProofHub is loaded with tools like inbuilt chat, casper mode and inbuilt proofing tools for reviewing designs, files and documents.

ProofHub’s price plan includes paid accounts option and a free account option with 1 free project, unlimited users, time tracking, milestones, proofing tool, inbuilt chat, casper mode and unlimited users.
